data.name: Invasion of Jam
data.desc: Royal Navy expedition against San Domingo and Sp Jam
data.locn: Barbados, Nevis, St. Kitts, San Domingo, Jam
data.agents_sp: Juan Ram√≠rez de Arellano, Bernardino de Meneses 2400 men in Hispaniola 1500 men in Jam
data.agents_nsp0: Oliver Cromwell, Adm Willliam Penn, Gen Robert Venables 8000 men
data.note:
See R. Venables & C. H. Firth, *The narrative* [Lon, sn, 1900] /v Haring 85 /
 6 Royal Navy ships [of 12 left at Jam under Vice-Admiral William Goodson] were [24 Jul 1655] at sea picking up a few scattered Spanish prizes which helped to pay for the victuals supplied out of New England /v Haring /218, 230, 231 CSPC 9 [Addenda]
